name: Possum
description: Possum Finance brings No-Loss Prediction Markets to DeFi. Our mission is to aggregate market intelligence for the benefit of protocol users. What makes No-Loss Prediction Markets possible is an intricate economic feedback loop between predictions by users and shared trading capital in a vault. The trading capital underpins the value of PSM and is managed automatically by signals from protocol users. In other words, No-Loss Prediction Markets is a tool for decentralized and incentivized sentiment polling that gives signals to a trading engine.
